English: I have three dogs and two cats.
French: J'ai trois chiens et deux chats.

English: She bought ten apples and six oranges.
French: Elle a acheté dix pommes et six oranges.

English: The store sold out of bread before noon.
French: Le magasin a vendu tout le pain avant midi.

English: We need to calculate the total cost.
French: Nous devons calculer le coût total.

English: The train leaves at four o'clock.
French: Le train part à quatre heures.
